meanings.definition: Not exotic; not foreign or unusual.
meanings.sent1: The local park is filled with nonexotic flowers and trees.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the nonexotic flavors of vanilla and chocolate ice cream.
meanings.sent3: His nonexotic taste in music always surprises his friends.
meanings.sent4: The nonexotic landscape reminded her of home.
meanings.sent5: The nonexotic bird chirped happily in the tree.

meanings.sent1: The restaurant served nonexotic dishes like burgers and fries.
meanings.sent2: The nonexotic design of the building blended in with the others on the street.
meanings.sent3: Her nonexotic wardrobe consisted of jeans and t-shirts.
meanings.sent4: The nonexotic routine of his daily life bored him.
meanings.sent5: The nonexotic weather made for a peaceful afternoon.
